item.title: Today is the last day to nominate for the OSMF Board! https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2022/10/13/nominate-yourself-for-the-osm-foundation-board-elections-by-october-22/ #openstreetmap #opendata #foss4g #gis

The fine print: in order to run, you need to be a normal OSMF member 28 days before the election, not an associate one, and you must have been a member during the full 180 days before the election (Deadline: Oct.22) https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2022/10/13/nominate-yourself-for-the-osm-foundation-board-elections-by-october-22/‚Ä¶ #openstreetmap #gis
#4 is from @HeatherLeson@twitter.com https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/Heather%20Leson/diary/391284
#3 is from Frederik Ramm http://osm.gryph.de/2019/11/osmf-board-give-newbs-a-chance/
#2 is from @joostjakob@twitter.com https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/joost%20schouppe/diary/391079
Want to know more about what it's like to serve on the OSM Board? Check out these links: #1 is from @mikel@twitter.com https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/mikelmaron/diary/400132

Q: How long is a board term? A: Board members serve 2 year terms and may be reelected a few times, with a term limit of 3 terms in the last 8 elections. https://wiki.osmfoundation.org/wiki/Articles_of_Association#GENERAL_MEETINGS

Here‚Äôs an OpenStreetMap Board mini FAQ to help you decide about nominating yourself or someone else to the Board: (Deadline: Oct.22) https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2022/10/13/nominate-yourself-for-the-osm-foundation-board-elections-by-october-22/‚Ä¶ #openstreetmap #gis

Wondering what the OSMF board does? Volunteers work on admin policy, fundraising, vote on resolutions, and support the Working groups. Come join us. Nominate yourself by Oct. 22. Or encourage a friend! #osm #foss4g #opensource https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2022/10/13/nominate-yourself-for-the-osm-foundation-board-elections-by-october-22/

There are now 4 seats available on the OSMF board. Nominate yourself by Oct. 22. https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2022/10/13/nominate-yourself-for-the-osm-foundation-board-elections-by-october-22/ #openstreetmap #gis

RT @geomob@twitter.com üö®üåçüó£Ô∏è In Ep. 151 of the @geomob@twitter.com podcast @freyfogle@twitter.com chats with @firefishy1@twitter.com all about OpenStreetMap Operations https://thegeomob.com/podcast/episode-151 üê¶üîó: https://twitter.com/geomob/status/1581935532770148352

Have you considered running for the OpenStreetMap Foundation board of directors? There are three seats available and the deadline to nominate yourself is Oct 22nd https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2022/10/13/nominate-yourself-for-the-osm-foundation-board-elections-by-october-22/ #openstreetmap #opendata #foss4g

The OpenStreetMap Foundation Board of Directors helps support the OSM project -- and you can be on it! The deadline to nominate yourself is Oct. 22, read here to learn more! https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2022/10/13/nominate-yourself-for-the-osm-foundation-board-elections-by-october-22/ #openstreetmap

Did you know? The deadline to run for the OpenStreetMap Foundation Board of Directors is Oct. 22nd! There will be three open seats, consider running yourself! https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2022/10/13/nominate-yourself-for-the-osm-foundation-board-elections-by-october-22/ #openstreetmap

Do you want to help support the OSM project? Run for the OpenStreetMap Foundation board! The deadline to file to run is Oct. 22nd. The Board works on administrative, policy, and fundraising issues, votes on resolutions & supports the OSMF Working Groups https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2022/Election_to_Board

Learn more about the OpenStreetMap Foundation Board from current Board member Mikel Maron! The deadline to run for the three available seats is Oct. 22nd https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/mikelmaron/diary/400132

Interested in getting involved with the OpenStreetMap Foundation's Board of Directors? Learn more here -- the deadline to run for the Board is 22 October! https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2022/10/13/nominate-yourself-for-the-osm-foundation-board-elections-by-october-22/ #OpenStreetMap

The deadline for running for the OpenStreetMap Foundation Board of Directors is coming up, October 22nd! Learn more about how to run and the Board at our latest blog post! https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2022/10/13/nominate-yourself-for-the-osm-foundation-board-elections-by-october-22/ #OpenStreetMap

The @geomob@twitter.com podcast is an excellent series of interviews with all sorts of geospatial people ("for fun or profit"). Check out this list of OpenStreetMap related episodes: https://thegeomob.com/podcast/tags/openstreetmap

The UN and the EU have launched seven challenges around and on OpenStreetMap and Sustainable Development Goals, running until the end of October. https://ideas.unite.un.org/sdg11/Page/Overview has all the details. The EU will reward the best solutions with a ‚Ç¨10k prize.
